1115350.name: World of Guns VR: Suppressed Guns Pack #1
1115350.description:
This set of 3D models contains guns designed for use with sound suppressors (silencers): not as quiet as Hollywood led us to believe, but every bit as special.
Included models:
1. Welrod MK - pistol
2. HK SL9SD - rifle
3. Mac-10 - smg
4. Kriss Vector SMG - smg
5. UZI - smg
6. SW M&P - pistol
7. Nagant m1895 - revolver
8. BT MP9 - smg
9. AKS 74U - assault rifle
10. Walther PP - pistol
1115350.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 捷克语, 荷兰语, 日语, 韩语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 瑞典语, 繁体中文, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语
